ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And you will be classed into three:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: You shall then become three groups.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On that day, you (mankind) will be divided into three groups:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And you will become divided into three categories.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And you (all) will be in three groups.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And you shall be three sorts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and you shall be three bands --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And ye will be three kinds:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [on that Day] you shall be divided into three groups.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And ye shall be sorted out into three classes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And you (all) will be in three kinds (i.e. separate groups).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: you shall be divided into three parties,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:7] and you will be, at the Resurrection, three kinds, categories:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And ye will be) on the Day of Judgement (three kinds:
